overview: The story revolves around Nargis (Nadia al-Jundi), the wife of Sayed (Farouk al-Fishawi), who co-exists with your wife yourself with Said Saleh, without knowing her. (Sinjoy), do you know her (Manglawi), and agree with (Snarh) to be willing to kill herself (Manglawi).
title: A Woman's Might
